fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Prepare a speech during the day.

fields.name: - If there isn't a Mafia Killing role in the game:
fields.value: Order your goon to perform the factional Mafia kill each night.

fields.name: Speech Attributes:
fields.value:
- When you prepare a speech, you will inspire your fellow Mafia, including yourself (and your goon), the following night.

- Being inspired gives all Mafia members temporary roleblock and control immunity, and their visit during the night will be Astral.

- When the Mafia are inspired, members may use the ability of a dead Mafia member instead of their own. However, they cannot use the abilities of Mafia Killing roles.

- You cannot prepare a speech two days in a row.

- You may only prepare a speech three times.

fields.name: Goon Attributes:
fields.value:
- When you order your goon to perform the factional Mafia kill, you will not visit the target. You will appear to stay home to a Tracker.

- Your goon can be killed as a result of visiting your target. If they are, you will no longer be able to order them to perform the factional Mafia kill.

- If a Lookout or Trapper sees your goon visit their target, they will see that "The Godfather's Goon" visited their target.

- Your goon will be seen as a malicious visitor to a Spy.

- If your goon is performing the factional Mafia kill, you will not appear to have blood to a Detective.

- If your goon is attacked by a Bodyguard, the Bodyguard will survive, but your goon will not. The Bodyguard will be notified that they killed your goon.

- When your goon dies, it will be announced to the town that your goon has died.
